title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
creator_credit: Don Siegel, Walter Wanger and Allied Artists Pictures
brief_description: Tense and atmospheric tale of alien duplicates who gradually hatch from pods and take over the inhabitants of a small town. Based on the novel by Jack Finney. Stars Kevin McCarthy and Dana Wynter.
